reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Parker is incredibly knowledgeable and passionate about the subject. Her lectures are engaging and she genuinely cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Stewart explains complex concepts very clearly, but his grading is quite tough. You really need to put in the work to do well in his class.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: The material is interesting, but Dr. Mitchell's lectures can be a bit dry at times. Still, she's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Hayes makes history come alive! His storytelling approach keeps everyone hooked. Exams are fair and directly related to his lectures.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is very knowledgeable, but her teaching style is not very approachable. The course is difficult and her explanations can be hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Clark is great at breaking down economic theories. The course is challenging but rewarding if you stay on top of the readings.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. White's passion for literature is contagious! Her feedback on essays is incredibly detailed and helpful.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Miller's classes are informative, but sometimes the pace is too fast. He assumes everyone has a strong background in physics.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown encourages critical thinking and class discussions. The material can be dense, but she makes it accessible.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Green is a fantastic lecturer. He challenges students to think deeply and critically. The workload is heavy but manageable.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's lectures are informative but sometimes feel a bit disconnected. The readings are essential for understanding the material.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. King provides a balanced view on political issues. The class discussions are engaging and he values diverse opinions.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is brilliant, but her teaching style is very technical and can be hard to follow. The projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson is passionate about the environment and it shows in his lectures. The course is hands-on and very interesting.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson's knowledge of art is impressive. The course is visually stimulating and the assignments are creative.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Walker is good at explaining statistical concepts, but the material can be dry. Homework is essential to grasp the content.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is an amazing professor who makes linguistics fascinating. Her lectures are well-organized and she encourages participation.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson has a deep understanding of music theory and his passion is evident. The course is demanding but very rewarding.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is knowledgeable, but her lectures can be difficult to follow. The readings are dense, but necessary to succeed in the course.

reviews.subject: Civil Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is highly experienced and his practical insights are invaluable. The course is challenging but he provides great support.
